short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your PDF experience with our all-in-one Chrome extension for converting, splitting, merging, and securing PDFs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With our extension, you can easily convert, rotate, split, merge, and secure PDF files with just a few clicks. Whether you're a business professional looking to streamline your document management or a student needing a comprehensive study tool, our extension has you covered.

Here are just a few of the many features you'll enjoy with our extension:

Convert PDF files to editable DOC, and convert Word, Excel, PowerPoint & more to a PDF format
Split large PDF files into smaller, more manageable sections
Merge multiple PDF files into a single document for easy organization
Rotate as many pages as you want, one by one or all at once
Protect your sensitive documents with password encryption and digital signature features
Preview your PDF files before making any changes to ensure you're making the proper edits

And much more!

When you install EZ PDF on your browser, you acknowledge and agree to abide by the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy that govern the use of the extension.
https://www.ezpdfs.com/eula
https://www.ezpdfs.com/privacy
